faqs.question: What is Gopal Kumar's professional experience?
faqs.answer: Gopal Kumar worked at ADRASTI in Bengaluru, India as a Frontend Developer from May 2025 to Nov 2025, designing dynamic frontend interfaces with React.js and integrating real-time data updates using WebSocket and SSE streaming. He also developed interactive UI components for data visualization and automation workflows.

faqs.question: What technical skills does Gopal Kumar have?
faqs.answer: Gopal Kumar has skills in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, React.js, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, VS Code, Windows, and GitHub.

faqs.question: What projects has Gopal Kumar worked on?
faqs.answer:
Gopal Kumar has worked on several projects: 
1. Chatbot Tutor – AI-powered tutoring chatbot with React.js frontend and Node.js/Express.js backend, including real-time text and image input handling.
2. Hotel Management System (HMS) – Full-stack hotel management app with room booking, check-in/check-out, billing, and dynamic dashboards.
3. Customer Relationship Management (CRM) System – Frontend with React.js, backend APIs with Node.js/Express.js, data storage in MongoDB, interactive dashboards for customer interactions.
4. Real-Time Interactive Dashboard – React.js dashboard with WebSocket and SSE streaming, interactive charts and tables for live data analytics.

faqs.question: What is Gopal Kumar's educational background?
faqs.answer: Gopal Kumar completed MCA from L.N.M.I College in 2022 (CGPA: 6.7), BCA from L.N.M.I College in 2018 (CGPA: 6.1), Intermediate (12th) from B.S.E. B in 2015 (CGPA: 6.1), and Matriculation (10th) from B.S.E. B in 2012 (CGPA: 6.4).
